comment: Smart Data Models - Agri Greenhouse adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Agrifood/master/AgriGreenhouse/schema.json
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the conditions recorded within a generic greenhouse, a type of AgriParcel.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: co2
contents.comment: The measured interior C02 concentration nominally in mg/L

contents.name: dailyLight
contents.comment: Daily Accumulated light measured in kW per square metre

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: leafTemperature
contents.comment:
The inside relative humidity expressed as a number between 0 and 1 representing the range 0% to 100 (%).

0 <= relativeHumidity <= 1

contents.name: relativeHumidity
contents.comment: The average greenhouse air temperature nominally in degrees centigrade.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: hasAgriParcelChildren
contents.comment: Related sub AgriParcel records to which this entity relates

contents.name: hasDevice
contents.comment: Reference to the IoT devices associated with this greenhouse i.e. sensors, controls.

contents.name: hasWaterQualityObserved
contents.comment: Reference to one or more water quality observation records current for this entity

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: relatedSource
contents.comment: List of IDs the current entity may have in external applications

contents.name: drainFlow
contents.comment: The observed drain flow rate in litres per second
